00100 #include <unistd.h>
00101 #include <sys/types.h>
00102 #include <sys/param.h>
00103 #include <time.h>

00106 
00107 cache_content_status_t cache_content_truncate( cache_content_entry_t      * pentry,
00108                                                fsal_size_t                  length,  
00109                                                cache_content_client_t     * pclient,
00110                                                cache_content_status_t     * pstatus ) 
00111 {
00112   off_t local_cache_len ;
00113     
00114   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00115 
00116   /* Perform the truncate operation */
00117   if( truncate( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, (off_t)length ) != 0 )
00118     {
00119       /* Operation failed */
00120 
00121       /* LOG */
00122       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00123                          "cache_content_truncate: impossible to truncate %s on local fs, error = ( %d, '%s' )",
00124                          pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, errno, strerror( errno ) ) ;
00125       
00126       /* Sets the error */
00127       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00128     }
00129   
00130   return *pstatus ;
00131 } /* cache_content_truncate */
